content: into first single_crochet skip did you work the first chain 4 one double_crochet one single_crochet into next double * one before turning this produces pattern double_crochet into single_crochet one chain one double 2 a neater edge row times into same single_crochet as first double skip one double 1 crochet one single_crochet into next double repeat from * ending with one double one chain one double into last single do you have 14 shells and 1 crochet half shell at each end chain one turn one single_crochet into first double_crochet *one double_crochet into next single_crochet one chain one pattern double 2 times into same single_crochet as first double skip row one double_crochet one single_crochet into next double 2 repeat from * working last single_crochet into 3rd chain of turning chain do you have a total of four as pattern row 1 use the crochet chart page 1 for quick row do you have two tails final row reference leave a loop and a tail of 50 centimetres or 20 one on each end of the inches headband with crochet hook in last loop work 1 to 2 chain with this long is your plait made of five tail and slip_stitch into centre of the vertical edge into this strands with two double strands tie 1 same edge thread two lengths of yarn each 100 cm or 40 and one single strand held inches gives 5 strands each 50 cm or 20 inches gently adjust together each twist the five strands and plait knot the end to secure if your 2 plaited ties are not thread two lengths of yarn each 100 cm or 40 inches adjust even adjust the knots at the tie 2 the five strands and plait knot the end to secure trim both ties end of the plaits and trim one one inch from the knot inch from knot sizing for a smaller/larger headband subtract 6/add 6 chain to foundation chain for further information email julzlovell@gmail com etsy store https //www etsy com/shop/bandanaheads hair accessories from bandana heads copyright © 2007 bandana heads all rights reserved page 2
